comments.body:
set -o errexit caused the script to early-terminate if any one test failed.

On Thu, Oct 16, 2014 at 12:25 PM, bgrant0607 notifications@github.com
wrote:

> In hack/e2e-test.sh:
> 
> > @@ -81,21 +81,21 @@ for test_file in $(ls "${KUBE_ROOT}/hack/e2e-suite/"); do
> >    fi
> > 
> >    echo "running $test_file"
> > -  "${KUBE_ROOT}/hack/e2e-suite/${test_file}"
> > -  result="$?"
> > -  result=0
> > -  "${KUBE_ROOT}/hack/e2e-suite/${test_file}" || result="$?"
> 
> Why was this necessary?
> 
> ## 
> 
> Reply to this email directly or view it on GitHub
> https://github.com/GoogleCloudPlatform/kubernetes/pull/1837/files#r18979712
> .
That was a hint to add a comment :-), but I'll merge as is.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +83,87 @@  echo "running $test_file"
  result=0
  "${KUBE_ROOT}/hack/e2e-suite/${test_file}" || result="$?"
  if [[ "${result}" -eq "0" ]]; then
    echo "${test_file} returned ${result}; passed!"

comments.body: Please document in comment at the top or something.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +70,74 @@fi

TEST_PATTERN="${TEST_PATTERN:-}"
any_failed=0
for test_file in $(ls "${KUBE_ROOT}/hack/e2e-suite/"); do
